channel.title: How do i turn off cookies on my computer?
channel.description:
I have just started playing moparscape today, but I cannot figure out how to turn off my cookies. Could somebody please help me out here? Thanks,
Juacque ;)

item.title: How do i turn off cookies on my computer?
item.dc:creator: @TheDarkMage TheDarkMage
item.description:
@TheDarkMage wrote:

omg you don’t know? Well it depends on what browser you’re using. If you’re looking for an answer just press f1 (or whatever gets you you’re computer help)

Right click.

the choice over Full screen.

And there click the second tab there you can fix it to only one site.

item.title: How do i turn off cookies on my computer?
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I guess if you’re a nut about cookies (and running firefox), you could also check “Always clear private data when closing firefox”, and under settings make sure that cookies are selected. You can do the same with history and file downloads, if thats the sorta thing you’re into…

item.title: How do i turn off cookies on my computer?
item.dc:creator: @nator123123 nator123123
item.description:
@nator123123 wrote:

Your computer has a cookie jar?

anywayz, what browser you use.

FireFox:
Tools -> Options -> Privacy Tab -> Disable “Accept cookies for sites”
IE:
Tools -> Internet Options -> Privacy Tab -> Lower Slider to “Block All Sites”
Opera:
Tools -> Preferences -> Advanced -> Cookies -> Enabled “Never Accept Cookies”

Read full topic
item.source: How do i turn off cookies on my computer?

item.title: How do i turn off cookies on my computer?
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

It would be nice to know what browser you’re using, believe it or not, it matters and it help a lot.

Anyway, if you’re using Firefox:

Open Firefox and go to Tools -> Options -> Privacy tab -> Uncheck the box that says “Accept cookies from sites”.

If you’re using Internet Explorer:

Open Internet Explorer and go to Tools -> Internet Options -> Privacy tab -> Move the slider that you see all the way up to the top so that it says “Block All Cookies”.

There you go…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i turn off cookies on my computer?
